steps.name: click on  accounts tab
open companies list
open company
open accounts tab
default debit account name is  BusinessClouds (Demo)
click on close tab
open accounts tab
default income account name is  Sales - BD
click on sales invoice tab
click on sales invoice option
click on new sales invoice btn
select  customer
enter dues date
Scroll down to item field
select item
unselect update stock opt
scroll up to save and submit btn
save and submit sales invoice
click on yes btn
grand total amount of sales invoice is 115.000
total amount of sales invoice is 100.000
click on view btn
click on general ledger choice
value which exist at default debit account
verify that Default Debit Account At GL has the same value of grand total Amount For Sales Invoice
Default Debit Account At GL report has  and  value of grand total Amount For Sales Invoice is  115.000 and this is correct
default income account name is Sales - BD
value which exist at default income account 100.000
verify that Default income Account At GL has the same value of total Amount For Sales Invoice
Default income Account At GL report has 100.000 and  value of  total Amount For Sales Invoice is  100.000 and this is correct
closing debit value at general ledger report is 115.000
closing credit value at general ledger report is 115.000
verify that closing values ( debit & credit )  at general ledger are equals to  grand total amount for sales invoice
closing debit value at general ledger is 115.000  and grand total amount for sales invoice is 115.000 and this is correct
closing credit value at general ledger is 115.000   and grand total amount for sales invoice is 115.000 and this is correct
